channel.title: CVE Feed for Kakao piccoma Corp. -- "Piccoma" App for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kakao piccoma Corp. -- "Piccoma" App for Android

item.title: CVE-2024-38480|2024-07-02T14:22:07.745Z -- kakao%20piccoma%20corp. -- %22piccoma%22%20app%20for%20android
item.description: "Piccoma" App for Android and iOS versions prior to 6.20.0 uses a hard-coded API key for an external service, which may allow a local attacker to obtain the API key. Note that the users of the app are not directly affected by this vulnerability.
